course_title: PMHNP Practice I: Foundations of PMH Practice Across the Lifespan
course_description: This clinical practicum provides an opportunity to integrate theory and practice in supervised clinical experiences with an approved site and preceptor. Clinical supervision will provide feedback during both individual and group post clinical conferences.
